Package util

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Utils
  • public class Utils
extends Object
    Utility class containing various methods for interacting with stocks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Utils()

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addNewStock​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
      Adds a new stock to the provided map of stocks.
      static int menuList()
      Displays the menu list and prompts the user to enter a choice.
      static Map<String,​Stock> populateStocks()
      Populates and returns a map of stocks for demonstration purposes.
      static void purchaseStocks​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
      Allows the user to purchase stocks from the provided map of stocks.
      static void searchStock​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
      Searches for stocks by company name in the provided map of stocks and prints the results.
      static void sellStocks​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
      Allows the user to sell stocks from the provided map of stocks.

    • Method Detail

      • menuList

        public static int menuList()
        Displays the menu list and prompts the user to enter a choice.
        Returns:
        The user's choice.

      • addNewStock

        public static void addNewStock​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
        Adds a new stock to the provided map of stocks.
        Parameters:
        stocks - The map containing existing stocks.

      • searchStock

        public static void searchStock​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
        Searches for stocks by company name in the provided map of stocks and prints the results.
        Parameters:
        stocks - The map containing existing stocks.

      • purchaseStocks

        public static void purchaseStocks​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
        Allows the user to purchase stocks from the provided map of stocks.
        Parameters:
        stocks - The map containing existing stocks.
        Throws:
        StocksException - If an invalid stock ID is entered or insufficient stocks are available for purchase.

      • sellStocks

        public static void sellStocks​(Map<String,​Stock> stocks)
        Allows the user to sell stocks from the provided map of stocks.
        Parameters:
        stocks - The map containing existing stocks.
        Throws:
        StocksException - If an invalid stock ID is entered.

      • populateStocks

        public static Map<String,​Stock> populateStocks()
        Populates and returns a map of stocks for demonstration purposes.
        Returns:
        A map containing stock details.
